EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference in Malaysia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
You're now registered for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming event. Here are the details you'll need:
Event: Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference in Malaysia Date: October 8-9 Location: The Majestic Hotel Kuala Lumpur 5 Jalan Sultan Hishamuddin, 50000 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia Reserve your room <[[https://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%20Aerospace%20Singapore%20Pte%20Ltd%20Conference%5EKulak%60HASHASA%60390.00%60MYR%60false%602%6010/5/19%6010/11/19%6010/4/19&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>.
Please contact andrew.kirk@honeywell.com <[[mailto:andrew.kirk@honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
